\t\tThanks for using Pocket Pantry! This app was developed by me during my senior year in the University of Sioux Falls Computer Science program. I hope that it has proven useful to you! Visit the contact page to send me a message if you have questions or comments.

Icons:

Trash icon made by Kiranshastry on flaticon.com

Chef, Recipe book, Fridge, and House icon made by Freepik on flaticon.com

Lists icon made by Smashicons on flaticon.com

Thanks to all!
Please enter quantity for stock level calculations
Don\'t forget to set your stock level!
